exec: * Extracts the JWT token from the login response and stores it in `AUTH_TOKEN` variable
//clear all transient collection variables such as tag ids, schema ids, context ids
* Publishes as policy blocks by their tag name as postman variable, so that they can be
* Parses retrieved schemas and publishes schema ids and schema contexts
* as collection variable for sub-sequent request.

item.name: Send Activity Data (based on policy data)

exec: * Fetches the last item from get trequest on a grid
* Also publishes common elements such as Id,Did and the document as variable
* Walks the document recursivly and applies the `onVisit` method to each
